name: generator-jhipster-blockchain
description: JHipster module to set a simple web application and an Hyperledger Fabric network v1.4 to manage entities on a blockchain.

author.name: Jordan JEAN, Enzo MOLION, LÃ©o VALETTE, Loris GENTILLON

scripts.release: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
